code: import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import routeConfig from'./routesBreadcrumbs.json';export{routeConfig};var useBreadcrumbs=function useBreadcrumbs(routeConfig){var paths=[];var route=useLocation().pathname;var name=routeConfig;var position=1;while(position!==-1){paths.push(route.slice(0,position));position=route.indexOf('/',position+1);if(position===-1&&route!=="/")paths.push(route);}paths=paths.map(function(route){var breadcrumb=name.find(function(breadcrumb){return breadcrumb.path===route;});if(breadcrumb!==undefined)return breadcrumb;else{var routeName=route.slice(route.lastIndexOf('/')+1);return{path:route,name:routeName};}});return paths;};export default useBreadcrumbs;
